languages.text: "Ты заменил железом свое тело, но жадность не изжить холодом металла. Перестань смотреть на мое снаряжение с такой алчностью, мон-кай".
"You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Ты заменил железом свое тело, но жадность не изжить холодом металла. Перестань смотреть на мое снаряжение с такой алчностью, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你用钢铁取代了你的身体，但即便是换成了冰冷的金属，也无法治愈你的贪婪。别再这样两眼发直地看着我的装备了，猴子。”
languages.original_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “你用钢铁取代了你的身体，但即便是换成了冰冷的金属，也无法治愈你的贪婪。别再这样两眼发直地看着我的装备了，猴子。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Reemplazaste tu cuerpo por hierro, pero el metal no puede curar la avaricia. Veo cómo miras mi equipamiento, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «Reemplazaste tu cuerpo por hierro, pero el metal no puede curar la avaricia. Veo cómo miras mi equipamiento, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「お前は身体を鉄で置き換えたが、その欲は冷たい金属で癒すことはできない。私の装備にそのような貪欲な眼差しを向けるのはやめろ、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は身体を鉄で置き換えたが、その欲は冷たい金属で癒すことはできない。私の装備にそのような貪欲な眼差しを向けるのはやめろ、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euren Körper durch Eisen ersetzt, aber Habsucht kann mit kaltem Metall nicht geheilt werden. Schielt nicht so gierig auf meine Ausrüstung, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euren Körper durch Eisen ersetzt, aber Habsucht kann mit kaltem Metall nicht geheilt werden. Schielt nicht so gierig auf meine Ausrüstung, Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez remplacé votre chair par l'acier, mais même le métal ne peut guérir la cupidité. Cessez donc de lorgner mon équipement, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez remplacé votre chair par l'acier, mais même le métal ne peut guérir la cupidité. Cessez donc de lorgner mon équipement, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

languages.text: "Vücudunu demirle bezedin ama açgözlülük soğuk metalle tedavi edilemez. Eşyalarıma böyle açgözlülükle bakmayı bırak mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "You replaced your body with iron, but greed cannot be cured with cold metal. Stop looking at my gear with such avarice, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Vücudunu demirle bezedin ama açgözlülük soğuk metalle tedavi edilemez. Eşyalarıma böyle açgözlülükle bakmayı bırak mon-keigh."
